chunks.title: How to Send Tokens
chunks.body: Detailed guide for sending tokens using NYLAGo. The process is simplified into 5 easy steps: Send tab → Username → Amount & token → Blockchain → 'Send to X.com' button.
chunks.summary_en: Send tokens in 5 steps: Go to Send tab, input recipient X username, enter amount and token, select blockchain, click 'Send to X.com'.
chunks.summary_zh: 5步发送代币：前往发送选项卡，输入收件人X用户名，输入金额和代币，选择区块链，点击'发送到X.com'。

steps.details: Open NYLAGo and click on the Send tab to access the transfer form.
Enter the recipient's X.com username WITHOUT the @ symbol. For example, if sending to @alice, just enter 'alice'.

steps.action: Enter the amount and the token you want to transfer
steps.details: Type the amount and select the token type (SOL, ETH, ALGO, etc.). Double-check the amount is correct.
Choose the blockchain network that matches your token (Solana for SOL, Ethereum for ETH, Algorand for ALGO). Network MUST match token type.
Click the 'Send to X.com' button to generate and automatically post your transfer command. NYLA will execute the transfer and reply with confirmation within 30-60 seconds.

pitfalls.solution: Always match network to token type (SOL→Solana, ETH→Ethereum, ALGO→Algorand). Cross-chain transfers are not supported.
Enter username without @ symbol. Use 'alice' not '@alice'.
Check wallet balance includes amount + network fees. Add more funds if needed.
Ensure command is copied exactly as generated. Avoid editing the command text.
Network congestion may delay transfers. Wait up to 10 minutes or check transaction hash on blockchain explorer.
